text: Alexandru Bădiţă is a retired water polo player from Romania. Bădiţă competed at the 1956 Summer Olympics and the 1960 Summer Olympics. He was born on 2 October 1937.Alexandru Bădiță == References == Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian water polo players Category:Olympians for Romania Category:Sportspeople from Bucharest
title: Alexandru Bădiţă
